DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective chart review/data collection study of natural orifice translumenal endoscopic surgery (NOTES) for ventral hernia repair, that will include questionnaires administered throughout the study. Subjects enrolled will be those intending to have a transvaginal NOTES ventral hernia repair. Data will be collected and reviewed through 12 months post-op.
DOC.brief_title: Natural Orifice Translumenal Endoscopic Surgery (NOTES): Laparoscopic Assisted Transvaginal Ventral Hernia Repair
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: 1. Umbilical or incisional hernia greater than 2 cm in size 2. Female, age 1875 3. Mentally competent to give informed consent 4. Scheduled to undergo a transvaginal NOTES ventral hernia repair Exclusion: 1. Pregnant women 2. Patients with defects measuring greater than 10 cm in size 3. Patients with complex hernias requiring fascial mobilization for closure 4. Morbidly obese patients (BMI >45)
